item.title: By: Milan
item.dc:creator: Milan
item.description: Woah! I'm really digging the template/theme of this website. It's simple, yet effective. A lot of times it's difficult to get that "perfect balance" between superb usability and visual appeal. I must say that you've done a very good job with this. In addition, the blog loads extremely quick for me on Safari. Superb Blog!
item.content:encoded: Woah! I’m really digging the template/theme of this website. It’s simple, yet effective. A lot of times it’s difficult to get that “perfect balance” between superb usability and visual appeal. I must say that you’ve done a very good job with this. In addition, the blog loads extremely quick for me on Safari. Superb Blog!
